text: No person, as an inducement to purchase insurance, shall issue or deliver, or permit its agents, officers, or employees to issue or deliver:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 13-265, see notes following ยง 31-2231.01.

DC CODE ยง 31-2231.09

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Agency company stock or other capital stock, benefit certificates, or shares in a common law corporation;
A special or advisory board contract or other contracts of any kind promising returns and profits.

heading.catch_text: Stock operations and advisory board contracts.
